txt.en: This medallion bears the emblem of the Boar-clan. It undoubtedly belongs to one of the inhabitants of Lower Barnavon. You should see if you can find its owner.

'Where did you find this? The thieving ruffians!

'Alas, it belonged to my wife, who was taken by the Ox-clan. I have not seen her since. I fear she was set to work in those accursed mines or worse.

'I thank you for bringing this to me... it is all I have left of her.'
You found a medallion bearing the emblem of the Boar-clan. It undoubtedly belongs to one of the inhabitants of Lower Barnavon.
Find the owner of the stolen keepsake
The remnant of the Boar-clan dwells in Lower Barnavon.\n\nYou should find the owner of the medallion you found.
